My idea is to make a enclosed cockpit for kerbal space program. It's going to be a 2 seater and I'm going to build a full control panel. This is what i have done so far.

Latest progress photo.

![9pmcuPP.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/9pmcuPP.jpg)

![iB9qZ9T.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/iB9qZ9T.jpg)

[Link to simpit's imgur album](https://imgur.com/a/AkwyM)

This is the old simpit before I redesigned it.

![Cf9oxoK.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/Cf9oxoK.jpg)

[Link to old simpit's imgur album](https://imgur.com/a/VHEaa)

Here is the link to software being developed for the simpit.

[https://github.com/Krewmember/External-MFD](https://github.com/Krewmember/External-MFD)

I hope you guys like it and I will keep you updated as I make progress.
